question: Name the important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain.
true_answer: Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel, El Torico, and Dinópolis.
asked_question_translated: Nævn de vigtigste turistattraktioner i Teruel, Spanien.
answer: De vigtigste turistattraktioner i Teruel, Spanien, inkluderer Plaza del Torico, Katedralen i Teruel, Akvedukten Los Arcos og de mange mudejar-tårne som Tårnet af El Salvador og Tårnet af San Martín.
answer_translated_eng: The main tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain, include the Plaza del Torico, the Cathedral of Teruel, the Aqueduct Los Arcos and the many mudejar towers such as the Tower of El Salvador and the Tower of San Martín.
